front.title: IEEE Draft Guide on the Prediction, Measurement, and Analysis of AM Broadcast Reradiation by Power Lines

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A set of procedures to be followed to cope with reradiation of AM broadcast signals from power lines and other large metallic structures is provided. Reradiation may be described as electromagnetic waves radiated from a structure that has parasitically picked up a signal from the environment. A simplified prediction technique called a survey is described to determine which structures could possibly cause a problem. Guidelines for measurements and data analysis are included.
